bossDialog: I PROTECT THIS TREASURE. INTRUDERS WILL BE SLAIN. YOU ARE AN INTRUDER. PLEASE IMMEDIATELY PERISH IN AN EFFICIENT MANNER.

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures deal 15% more damage with start-of-battle effects.
cardBonuses.4: Your creatures deal 15% more damage with start-of-battle effects.
cardBonuses.7: Your creatures' Spell Gems don't lose {STAT_charges} when they're {ACTION_cast} at the start of battle.

master.dialog: Automatons automatically decrease their enemies' stats without needing to waste a turn! How great is that? Let me show you how they work!
master.name: Marcus

name: Automaton
